profiles.name: Khalil Zried
profiles.message: As a content writer from Gaza, Palestine, living does not come easy for us here. Inspite of all the hardships I've been facing, I have tried to make this guide easy to understand for all muslims around the world. I truly appreciate the efforts of the whole team to make this app easy to understand and use. I wish this app to be a great source to learn everything about salsat.

profiles.name: Nida Zaffar
profiles.message: As a UI/UX designer I have tried to make it as easy and clean to read and comprehend for all users around the world. I truly appreciate the efforts of whole team to make this app easy to understand and use. I wish it can be reached by as many people as possible so they can all learn the right and authentic method to offer Salah and thatâ€™s the true purpose behind making this app.

profiles.name: Salman Khan
profiles.message: A few months back, I realised that I needed to be more sincere in my salaat. As a non-arabic speaker, once I read the translation earnestly, it made a significant difference to my focus & intentions. And that was the motivation behind wanting this app out there.
